amendment.description: To amend chapter 21 of title 38, United States Code, to enhance adaptive housing assistance for disabled veterans and to reduce the amount appropriated for the Medicaid Integrity Program by $1,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2007 through 2010.

action.text: Amendment SA 2418 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Sununu.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2418 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
